Extract parameters' draws

Source: R/draws.R
extract_draws.Rd

Extract parameters' draws

extract_draws(obj, draws)

Arguments

obj

Array/Vector/Matrix of draws (cf. first dimension) or list of it.
draws

Vector of draws to extract.

Value

Dataframe with columns: Draw, Index, Value and Parameter.

Examples

x <- rnorm(1e3)
X <- matrix(x, ncol = 10)
a <- array(rnorm(80), dim = c(10, 2, 2, 2))
extract_draws(x, sample(1:length(x), 10))
#>    Draw Index      Value Parameter
#> 1   987    NA -0.7243031          
#> 2   882    NA -0.1294454          
#> 3   558    NA -0.4068792          
#> 4   671    NA  0.2240605          
#> 5   723    NA  0.5537659          
#> 6   344    NA -0.3748225          
#> 7    35    NA -0.0163258          
#> 8   211    NA -0.9950957          
#> 9   270    NA -0.4642373          
#> 10  183    NA -1.2984846          
extract_draws(X, sample(1:nrow(X), 10)) %>% head()
#>   Draw Index       Value Parameter
#> 1   77     1 -0.64673925          
#> 2   49     1 -0.26782068          
#> 3   46     1  2.98092487          
#> 4   33     1  0.44274836          
#> 5   53     1  1.35450579          
#> 6   19     1 -0.04296275          
extract_draws(a, sample(1:10, 5)) %>% head()
#>    Draw        Value Index Parameter
#> 4     4  0.001101175    NA   [1,1,1]
#> 5     5  0.371937966    NA   [1,1,1]
#> 7     7 -1.126069064    NA   [1,1,1]
#> 8     8 -1.684877471    NA   [1,1,1]
#> 10   10  0.187181644    NA   [1,1,1]
#> 14    4  0.335227359    NA   [2,1,1]
extract_draws(list(x = x, X = X, a = a), 1:10) %>% head()
#>   Draw Index      Value Parameter
#> 1    1    NA -0.1374551         x
#> 2    2    NA  0.2360422         x
#> 3    3    NA -1.5895893         x
#> 4    4    NA -0.3899635         x
#> 5    5    NA -0.2078879         x
#> 6    6    NA -0.3458473         x
